text: Leonid Vasilyevich Potapov (; 4 July 1935 â€“ 12 November 2020) was a Russian politician. He was the President of the Buryat Republic in RussiaA New And 'alternative' Market from August 1991 to July 2007. He was born in Uakit, Soviet Union. Potapov was a member of the Communist Party. Potapov died on 12 November 2020 at a Moscow hospital from COVID-19, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Buryatia
title: Leonid Potapov
